intro.description: Unlock your coding potential effortlessly with Clover. Where versioning becomes intuitive and coding becomes a breeze for programming learners

description.title: Streamlined Collaboration
description.subtitle: Bring your team together with built-in code review, real-time commenting, and seamless version control.

collaborativeCoding.title: Collaborative Coding
collaborativeCoding.description: Invite team members to review and comment on code changes in real-time.

seamlessVersioning.title: Seamless Versioning
seamlessVersioning.description: Track and manage code changes with built-in version control.

instantFeedback.title: Instant Feedback
instantFeedback.description: Get immediate feedback on your code with automated testing and linting.

title.line1: Explore some of the features of

project.title: Project
project.description: Create and manage projects with ease. Collaborate with your team and keep track of your progress.

editor.title: Editor
editor.description: Code with confidence in our editor. With syntax highlighting and linting, you'll never miss a beat.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: From learning the basics of HTML and CSS to diving deep into machine learning algorithms, each roadmap is meticulously crafted to help you achieve your goals.

nikolas.description: Software developer passionate about Computer Vision and Artificial Intelligence.

ryan.description: Software developer passionate about Java language and backend systems.

heitor.description: Enthusiastic Systems Development student with a passion for programming.

cta.title: Experience Intuitive Collaboration with Clover
cta.description: Empower your team to focus on innovation with real-time collaborative editing and streamlined version control.

footer.description: Clover is a website built with React, Java, and MongoDB, designed for collaborative code versioning.
